messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI-PromptOrganizer extension?
The ComfyUI-PromptOrganizer extension helps Stable Diffusion ComfyUI users save generated images to www.txt2any.com.
What is txt2any?

txt2any is a website that processes and extracts metadata injected by AUTO1111 or ComfyUI from uploaded AI-generated images. It allows users to compare prompts word by word and generation parameters one by one between different creative iterations.
How can users install the ComfyUI-PromptOrganizer extension using the command line?

Users can install the ComfyUI-PromptOrganizer extension by navigating to the 'custom_nodes' subdirectory in the command line, executing 'git clone https://github.com/txt2any/ComfyUI-PromptOrganizer', saving the txt2any API key in the txt2any.ini file, and restarting ComfyUI.
How can users install the ComfyUI-PromptOrganizer extension using ComfyUI Manager?

Users can install the extension by clicking 'Manager' to open the 'ComfyUI Manager Menu' dialog box, selecting 'Install via Git URL', pasting 'https://github.com/txt2any/ComfyUI-PromptOrganizer' into the dialog box, clicking 'OK', and restarting ComfyUI.
How do users generate an API key for txt2any?
Users can generate an API key from their user account on www.txt2any.com and save the key in the txt2any.ini file, replacing any existing content.
How can users use txt2any's 'Prompt Organizer' feature?

Users can replace the 'Save Image' node with the 'Save image to txt2any' node in their existing workflow. After executing the generation queue, a 'View in txt2any' button will appear, allowing users to preview the image and detailed generation information.
What can users do with the image preview in txt2any?
Users can close the preview by clicking on a blank area and compare the image's prompts and generation parameters with other images.
What is ComfyUI-PromptOrganizer?
ComfyUI-PromptOrganizer is a custom node for Stable Diffusion ComfyUI that automatically saves AI-generated images to www.txt2any.com.
How do you install ComfyUI-PromptOrganizer via terminal?

To install ComfyUI-PromptOrganizer via terminal, open the installation directory under terminal, enter the 'custom_nodes' sub-directory, execute the command 'git clone https://github.com/txt2any/ComfyUI-PromptOrganizer', save the txt2any API Key into the file 'txt2any.ini', and restart ComfyUI.
How do you install ComfyUI-PromptOrganizer via ComfyUI Manager?

To install ComfyUI-PromptOrganizer via ComfyUI Manager, first ensure ComfyUI Manager is installed. Then click on the 'Manager' button to bring up the 'ComfyUI Manager Menu' dialog, click on 'Install via Git URL', copy and paste 'https://github.com/txt2any/ComfyUI-PromptOrganizer' into the input field, click 'OK', and restart ComfyUI.
How do you configure ComfyUI-PromptOrganizer?
To configure ComfyUI-PromptOrganizer, generate an API Key from your www.txt2any.com account and save it in the file 'txt2any.ini'.
How do you use the txt2any Prompt Organizer in ComfyUI?

To use the txt2any Prompt Organizer in ComfyUI, replace the 'Save Image' node with the 'Save image to txt2any' node at the end of your workflow. After executing your workflow and the generation finishes, click on the 'View in txt2any' button to view the image and generation data on the txt2any website.
What features are available on www.txt2any.com?
Features available on www.txt2any.com include Prompt Comparison and Generation Data Comparison, which allow you to understand the significance of each text or parameter to achieve better results.
Is there a free tier available on www.txt2any.com?
Yes, the free tier on www.txt2any.com will always remain free.
